Pantheon:
This is ... This is a necklace that my wife gave Sarilu. Oh! Saril ... Thank you! At least some memory of my son. How much time has passed ... You can not come to terms with the death of his son ... You can not get used to the pain. Phew ...
Hopefully no more victims. They should not be. In another way, it is impossible!
And you step to the High Priest Prana , which is located in front of the Administration . Your mission on this island is over, get ready for a trip into the world.
